spirit:component.spirit:name: ten_gig_eth_pcs_pma

xilinx:isEnabled.xilinx:dependency: ((not ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_1588')) = 0) or ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_GTTYPE'))) > 1) )) and (id('PARAM_VALUE.SupportLevel') = '0') and (not(spirit:decode(id('PARAM_VALUE.TransceiverInExample'))))) or (((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_1588')) = 0) or ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_GTTYPE'))) > 1) ) and (id('PARAM_VALUE.SupportLevel') = '1') and ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_GTTYPE'))) > 1) and (not(spirit:decode(id('PARAM_VALUE.TransceiverInExample')))))

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: core_gt_drp_interface
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface from Core to Transceiver - connect directly to user_gt_drp_interface if no user interaction required

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: user_gt_drp_interface
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface to Transceiver - add arbiter if user interaction required

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: core_to_gt_drp
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface from Core to Transceiver - connect directly to gt_drp interface if no user interaction required

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: gt_drp
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface to Transceiver - add arbiter if user interaction required

spirit:busInterface.spirit:name: core_gt_drp
spirit:busInterface.spirit:description: DRP Interface between Core and Transceiver - connect directly to gt_drp interface if no user interaction required

xilinx:isEnabled.xilinx:dependency: ((not ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_1588')) = 0) or ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_GTTYPE'))) > 1) )) and (id('PARAM_VALUE.SupportLevel') = '0') and (not(spirit:decode(id('PARAM_VALUE.TransceiverInExample'))))) or (((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_1588')) = 0) or ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_GTTYPE'))) > 1) ) and (id('PARAM_VALUE.SupportLevel') = '1') and ((spirit:decode(id('MODELPARAM_VALUE.C_GTTYPE'))) > 1) and (not(spirit:decode(id('PARAM_VALUE.TransceiverInExample')))))

spirit:enumeration.spirit:text: Include Shared Logic in example design

spirit:component.spirit:description: The Xilinx 10 Gigabit Ethernet PCS/PMA (10GBASE-R/KR) core is designed to the IEEE specification 802.3 2012. An example design is provided to accelerate your design cycle.
